title: Incorrect 'Build' popup action enablement
description: The 'Build' popup action is incorrectly enabled.
OB: The 'Build' popup action is enabled even when the build is already done.
EB: The 'Build' popup action should not be enabled if the build is already done.
SR:
1. Open the application.
2. Start a build.
3. Wait for the build to complete.
4. Check the enablement status of the 'Build' popup action.
